categories.name: All
categories.description: Shows all system applications regardless of category

categories.name: Aosp
categories.description: Core Android Open Source Project applications

categories.name: Carrier
categories.description: Applications installed by mobile carriers/network providers

categories.name: Google
categories.description: Google apps and services that may be required for the Play Store ecosystem

categories.name: Unlisted
categories.description: Applications not yet categorized in the database

removal_categories.name: All
removal_categories.description: Shows all system applications regardless of removal category

removal_categories.name: Recommended
removal_categories.description: Safe to remove for most users

removal_categories.name: Expert
removal_categories.description: Requires expert knowledge to safely remove

removal_categories.name: Advanced
removal_categories.description: Advanced users should understand implications before removal

removal_categories.name: Unsafe
removal_categories.description: Not recommended to remove, may cause system instability

removal_categories.name: Unknown
removal_categories.description: Unknown removal category, we do not have the information about this app
